page.title: 04YARD GAMES AT MOELFRE SCHOOL
page.content: One game is tick lines. One person is on and chases the others along the lines of the netball pitch trying to tick them. We call the centre circle "Bally", nobody can tick you in Bally. British Bulldog is a popular game.At the beginning one child stands in the middle while the others run from one side of the playground to the other. The child in the middle tries to catch the running children. If he is successful he shouts "British Bulldog 123" and the caught child helps to catch the others. We also play a handstand game called Knives, Forks and Spoons. Another tick game is called Buzz Off. We have a song game called The Wind. Lia Jones & Joanna Pentith.
